document_title: Chronic glomerulonephritis: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_name: viem-cau-than-man.json_6_People who often suffer from chronic glomerulonephritis
subsection_content:
Chronic glomerulonephritis is a disease that can happen to anyone of any age. However, people at risk of chronic glomerulonephritis often have the following things in common: (4)
People who have had acute glomerulonephritis; People with diabetes, high blood pressure or cardiovascular diseases; Family members have a history of kidney disease, especially glomerulonephritis; Elderly
subsection_title: viem cau than man.json. People who often suffer from chronic glomerulonephritis
